      • checkGeometry

        public static <T extends org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry> boolean checkGeometry(Collection<Feature> fs,
                                                                                   boolean checkValidity,
                                                                                   Class<T> cl)
        Check some features have a geometry (non null and non empty). Possibly check the geometry validity and its type.
        Parameters:
        fs - The input features
        Returns:
        true if OK, false else
